Description: Limestone ostracon with Coptic text containing a school exercise (a list of place and people names, mainly biblical).
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.39, pl.32)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (p.174-176)
Cribiore 1996 / Writing, teachers, and students on Graeco-Roman Egypt (no. 127)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (61737) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/61737)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 32:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: O.Rain.UnterrichtKopt. 248 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
